header_text: You've recently been putting money in savings to have in case of emergencies. Your credit card bill was more than you had expected this month, and you had to take a large bit of money from your savings to pay for it. You decide this is okay, and you will focus on budgeting in the future to increase your savings.

elements.Text: Are you worried about losing savings?
